Title: Ultimate Load Capability
Description: Fuselage structure shall withstand ultimate loads (1.5 × limit loads) without failure for ≥3 seconds
Rationale: Safety margin for unexpected load exceedances
Acceptance_Criteria: 1) Static tests demonstrate ultimate load capability for ≥3s; 2) FEA validates stress below material ultimate strength; 3) Margin of safety ≥0%
Verification_Method: Test: Full-scale static testing; Analysis: FEA; Inspection: Post-test inspection
Assumptions_Constraints: Material properties: A-basis or B-basis; Environmental conditions per CS-25.307

Title: Limit Load Elastic Behavior
Description: Fuselage structure shall exhibit elastic behavior (no permanent deformation) at limit loads
Rationale: Ensures structure operates within elastic range throughout service life
Acceptance_Criteria: 1) No permanent deformation >0.2% after limit load; 2) Strain measurements confirm elastic behavior; 3) Compliance for all limit load cases
Verification_Method: Test: Static testing with strain gauges; Analysis: FEA; Inspection: Dimensional inspections
Assumptions_Constraints: Load application rate per test plan; Temperature: -55°C to +85°C

Requirement_ID: [Additional rows follow the same pattern - add more requirements as needed]
